title: hiCare Chronic
description: Chronic diseases are the kind of prevalent health conditions that need regular monitoring. Irregular management may lead to unnecessary health complications, ER visits, hospitalization, and may cause incurring of more expenses while simultaneously reducing quality of life. Hifinite’s hiCare Chronic Disease Management app helps providers and caretakers by letting them engage with chronic patients in real time using modern technologies. hiCare helps patients track their health, allows self-scheduling, alerts providers and caretakers to address issues before they become worse, and allows remote access to providers. Whether you are maintaining a Blood Pressure or Blood Sugar diary, are tracking COPD conditions, or are monitoring your body temperature, hiCare Chronic Disease Management app is the ultimate health companion for you and your loved ones. Let’s see how! How does hiCare Chronic Disease Management app work? • Patients use connected probes and sensors through hiCare Chronic Disease Management app running on their smartphone to collect their vitals and medication adherence data. All this data is securely transmitted and stored on an HIPAA compliant cloud-based hiCare Chronic Platform. • Healthcare providers including physicians, nurses, and family members use the hiCare Chronic Disease Management app on their smartphones to monitor a patient’s vitals, compliance, and medication adherence data. • The system allows clinical staff to set custom thresholds for each patient. Whenever a patient takes a reading and the vital sign crosses the set threshold, an instant alert is sent to the providers and caretakers. The system provides multiple means of communication for parties to engage and resolve an emergency. How does hiCare Chronic Disease Management benefit the patients? • hiCare user dashboard displays the patient’s overall health status by showing vitals such as temperature, blood pressure, blood glucose level, capacity of vitals, blood oxygen saturation, weight and pulse rate, amongst others. • Patients can engage with their providers via calls, chats, SMS, and emails. • Patients can request an online appointment with the providers anytime, anywhere. • Patients can schedule online appointments for video consultation and setup reminder notifications for the same. • Patients can invite their friends and family to be up-to-date on their health status by allowing them to join their care circle. • Patients can track their overall health score based on adherence, vitals, and compliance rates. • Patients can view their electronic health record, which includes allergies, diagnoses, lab reports, medications, vaccinations, and medical procedures. • Additionally, patients can sign consent forms electronically, pay bills, view invoices, view the provider directory, and take surveys for helping collect subjective health data. How does hiCare Chronic Disease Management benefit the providers? • hiCare user dashboard displays the list of patients who need urgent care, based on their overall health score, along with the upcoming schedules of the logged-in user. • Providers can view their patients’ overall health status based on adherence, vitals, and compliance rates. • Providers can actively engage with their patients via calls, chats, SMS, and email. • Providers can schedule and conduct video consultations with their patients. To use the hiCare Chronic Disease Management app, you must have a hiCare account with Hifinite. About hiCare Hifinite aims to bring Highly Optimized Patient, Provider and Partner Engagement (H.O.P.E.), securely, in real-time, through hiCare, as a comprehensive, integrated technology solution, making an impact through integrating a variety of digital health products. Hifinite is truly Health. Connected.
